reviewText: It's great for someone who doesn't know much about dyslexia and is just beginning to find out what that diagnosis is. Not any new information for those that are out of school and into the real world. It's great for beginning knowledge.
I would recommend this book as a good read for those of us who want to keep apprised of what's new in the field of dyslexia.

This DVD features the story of G. Sagmiller, author, lecturer, advocate, MBA graduate, and dyslexic.  He has had to overcome many obstacles because of his learning disability and has achieved many successes in life despite having dyslexia, but some might say he has had many achievements BECAUSE of his dyslexia.  Mr. Sagmiller talks about his life and the many skills and techniques he has learned to become a success in life.  This is a first hand account of what it means to be diagnosed with dyslexia, and how to cope and overcome having a learning disability in today's fast paced world.
Great DVD also see his other items Book Dyslexia My Life Book ON CD Dyslexia My Life, Audiobook book on tape, now on CD Dyslexia My Life on Cassette Tape
